thread.section_title: School Stream - School Communication App Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of School Stream - School Communication App | schoolstream.com.au
thread.title: Rosalie. Office manager
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Rosalie. Office manager

author: Rosalie. Office manager
title: Rosalie. Office manager
text:
In the start a few dramas with not having a manual or step by step instructions available for posting etc. Tips page helps with this now.
Can be difficult to find a contact number on the helpdesk area. I look at the webpage for this info (and now have it written down)
Looking forward to the upgrade to have multiple tick boxes and logos present.
